name: Senior Procurement Specialist
description:
Job responsibilities:

  • Cooperation with Projects and Site Managers and Casale Project (CP) Management for the organization and improvement of projects purchasing activities;
  • Search for qualified vendors in RF (scouting) to extend CP VL;
  • On PR assigned issues the enquiries, RFQs to Vendors, Evaluation of Quotations received, follow up TBE issued by Engineering Dep. and issue CBE for approval in complying with procedures, standards;
  • Negotiation of PO conditions with vendors in compliance with the requirements of instructions, rules and CP standard PO conditions in cooperation with the people responsible for technical documents for the PR, Purchasing Section Manager and Head of Procurement of CP;
  • Monitoring the purchase until the purchase order closure (except expediting, inspection and test services).

Requirements:

  • relevant work experience in construction petrochemical companies;
  • excellent organizational and negotiation skills;
  • excellent knowledge of Russian contract-related legislation;
  • fluent English.

Conditions:

  • project related contract;
  • location: Togliatti;
  • working schedule: 5 days per week;
  • additional medical insurance;
  • support with relocation, apartment rent compensation for candidates from another cities.
